about_the_game:
Your village is being invaded by monsters, and only you and your keyboard can defeat them.
Every monster has a word above them, defeat the monster by typing out the word . Defend your village by stop the monsters from reaching the bottom of the screen.
There are different types of monsters and bosses, they all have interesting abilities. Can you stop them by excellent typing skills ?
Tips:
- Key Tab/Backspace can cancel the letters you already typed on one monster, then you can change a target.
- It's a typing game, so even the menu items are triggered by typing. For example, start to play by typing "Start Game" when at the startup menu.
- It has two different difficulty modes, and the survive mode will appear after you complete the game at the first time.
- If you still feel the game is way too easy, please try to type out the title "Typer Hero" on the startup sreen, and enjoy your game.
- About whick monster is prior. In fact, the first appeared monster has the first priority. But the speed of the monsters are different, so not the monster nearer to the bottom is prior. If you notice that the montser attacked is not the one you want. You can press Tab/Backspace to cancel and then the monster will be placed at the end of the line.


Updated this game on 10/04 and fixed the bugs such as a space befor one word or some word offscreen.

Updated on 2023/03/13
- English mode, imported all CET-6 (over 5500) vocabularies, (over 500)phrases and (over 100) sentences. Include pronounciations. And show Chinese tranlation on top of the English words.
- Show how many enemies need to be defeated in each level.
- Slightly accelerate the entrance of the monsters of each level.
- Survival Mode can always be choosed, instead of you should have cleared all the levels before.
